name: Darkenstein 3-D
description:
Darkenstein 3-D is the product of 10 months of learning game development. This project was created for me to learn and for you to enjoy, and will always remain free.

A fast-paced, almost boomer shooter with a gameplay mix of Wolfenstein 3-D, Return to Castle Wolfenstein, and some Doom 3.

The prompt is simple: the nazis stole your dog, kill them. Do you need more?

What you will find in this game:

- Nazis to kill.

- Euro Jank.

- Old school gameplay with lots of blood.

- 4 levels made the old way.

- Funny ragdolls.

- 1 boss fight.

- Classic wolfie weapons and some new ones (5 in this build).

- The journey of someone who 10 months ago had no clue how to make games.

- A complete game, when it is done.

What you will NOT find in this free game:

- A store

- Lootboxes

- Microtransactions.

- Season Pass

- DLC

This is an early build and as such will have some problems, although I've tested it extensively so no game breaking bugs should turn up.

Currently there are 4 maps in this build, and the final build is projected to have 12-13 maps.

I'm also very keen on adding mod support to the game in a later version, when I have an idea of how to go about that.

Some parts in some maps have performance issues, especially map 3. I'm running it on a relatively high end rig, so any feedback on performance is good.

Likewise, any other suggestions or reports you have will be good to hear.
